Package kentico.kontent.delivery

Class DeliveryOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • kentico.kontent.delivery.DeliveryOptions
  • public class DeliveryOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps settings which are provided by customer or have default values, used in DeliveryClient.
    See Also:
    DeliveryClient, KenticoKontent API reference - Authentication, KenticoKontent API reference - Delivery API, KenticoKontent API reference - Secure access, KenticoKontent API reference - Securing public access

        public DeliveryOptions​(java.lang.String projectId)
        Constructs a setting instance of DeliveryOptions using your Kentico Kontent Project identifier.
        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        projectId - The Project ID associated with your Kentico Kontent account. Must be in the format of an UUID.
        previewApiKey - The Preview API key configured with your Kentico Kontent account.

      • setPreviewApiKey

        public void setPreviewApiKey​(java.lang.String previewApiKey)
        The Preview API key configured with your Kentico Kontent account.
        Parameters:
        previewApiKey - Sets the value of the preview API key in this DeliveryOptions instance. If not null, automatically sets setUsePreviewApi(boolean) to 'true'.
        See Also:
        KenticoKontent API reference - Production vs. preview, KenticoKontent API reference - Authentication

      • getProductionEndpoint

        public java.lang.String getProductionEndpoint()
        The Production endpoint address. Mainly useful to change for mocks in unit tests, or if you are establishing a proxy.

        This defaults to "https://deliver.kontent.ai"

        Returns:
        The value of the pstring used as the production endpoint to KenticoKontent.
        See Also:
        KenticoKontent API reference - Production vs. preview, Formatter

      • getPreviewEndpoint

        public java.lang.String getPreviewEndpoint()
        The Preview endpoint address. Mainly useful to change for mocks in unit tests, or if you are establishing a proxy.

        This defaults to "https://assets-us-01.kc-usercontent.com/"

        Returns:
        The value of the string used as the preview endpoint to KenticoKontent.
        See Also:
        KenticoKontent API reference - Production vs. preview, Formatter

      • isUsePreviewApi

        public boolean isUsePreviewApi()
        This boolean flag determines if this client will use the preview API instead of the production API. Defaults to 'false'.
        Returns:
        Whether this DeliveryOptions instance is set to use the preview API instead of the production API.
        See Also:
        KenticoKontent API reference - Production vs. preview

      • isWaitForLoadingNewContent

        public boolean isWaitForLoadingNewContent()
        If the requested content has changed since the last request, the header determines whether to wait while fetching content. This can be useful when retrieving changed content in reaction to a webhook call. By default, when set to false, the API serves old content (if cached by the CDN) while it's fetching the new content to minimize wait time. To always fetch new content, set the header to true.
        Returns:
        Whether this DeliveryOptions instance is set to always fetch new content.

      • getRetryAttempts

        public int getRetryAttempts()
        Sets the number of retry attempts the client should make when a request to the API fails. Defaults to 3.
        Returns:
        The number of retry attempts configured per request in this DeliveryOptions instance.

      • getProxyServer

        public org.asynchttpclient.proxy.ProxyServer getProxyServer()
        Sets the proxy server used by the http client. See ProxyServer.Builder.
        Returns:
        The ProxyServer configured for this instance, or null.

        public void setUsePreviewApi​(boolean usePreviewApi)
        This boolean flag determines if this client will use the preview API instead of the production API. Defaults to 'false'.
        Parameters:
        usePreviewApi - Whether the preview API should be used instead of the production API. Defaults to 'false'. production API.
        See Also:
        KenticoKontent API reference - Production vs. preview

      • setWaitForLoadingNewContent

        public void setWaitForLoadingNewContent​(boolean waitForLoadingNewContent)
        If the requested content has changed since the last request, the header determines whether to wait while fetching content. This can be useful when retrieving changed content in reaction to a webhook call. By default, when set to false, the API serves old content (if cached by the CDN) while it's fetching the new content to minimize wait time. To always fetch new content, set the header to true.
        Parameters:
        waitForLoadingNewContent - New value for this DeliveryOptions instance.

      • setRetryAttempts

        public void setRetryAttempts​(int retryAttempts)
        Sets the number of retry attempts the client should make when a request to the API fails. Defaults to 3.
        Parameters:
        retryAttempts - New value for this DeliveryOptions instance.

        Sets the proxy server used by the http client. See ProxyServer.Builder.
        Parameters:
        proxyServer - The ProxyServer instance to use with the client each request.
